room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: We had an amazing, exciting time in the Kidnapping with only 6 seconds left to escape. So much fun, highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: We did the kidnapping. It was definitely challenging, but lots of fun. Will definitely recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: I went here for the first time with the GF and we had a blast. We did the kidnapped room and it was well worth it. The puzzles were challenging yet fun for both of us and our game master was very polite and helpful. We will definitely be back with our friends to play again in the future.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: Booked for our team-building challenge. What an experience! Our group of 7 ladies completed Kidnapping with only about 2 minutes left to spare. Twists and turns every direction, we really had to think outside the box and work together for the various combinations in the room and eventually out of the door. Thank you Marlon for being a wonderful game master and putting up with our shenanigans :) we will DEFINITELY be back again!!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: First escape room I ever did. It was awesome! Definitely made me addicted. Also the staff was awesome!
